lyrics.stanza: Remember your Creator While you are young, As a child, know the Scriptures And seek out God's truth. Oh, remember your Creator While you are young, And let Him have a way In the days of your youth.
Remember your Creator While you are young. To remember our Creator Means to love Him. The Lord is the Creator, Our source of life. In the days of our youth We would love only Him.
We treasure the Word of God While we are young, As a child, we may read it And read it again. Yes, the Scriptures are able To make us wise, Wise unto salvation In Jesus the Lord.

We come to the light When we come to God's Word, How the light brightly shines When we really love God! As we love Him and seek Him, God opens His Word, So that God's light shines brightly In His holy Word.
We like to spend time In the Word of our God, To be faithful to read it With diligent care. Yes, we read and we pray, And we pray what we read— In the days of our youth, We would open God's Word.
Remember your Creator While you are young, From a child, know the Scriptures And seek out God's truth. Oh, remember your Creator All your life long. And let HIm have a way All your days on the earth.
